agents.agent_base.Agent¶

class agents.agent_base.Agent(postman, acolor='red', mcolor='white', uid=None, idd=None, verbose=True, log_file=None, env=None, **paras)¶

Bases: object

Base Agent from which all Agents in Mercury inherit. It provides some common functionalities for all Agents in the model.

__init__(postman, acolor='red', mcolor='white', uid=None, idd=None, verbose=True, log_file=None, env=None, **paras)¶
